altername_name: Transformers: La Guerra por Cybertron: Decepticons
name: Transformers: War for Cybertron: Decepticons
overview: Transformers: War for Cybertron features two distinct storylines: the AUTOBOT campaign tells a story of heroism to save their home planet against overwhelming odds, and the DECEPTICON campaign tells a story of an unquenchable thirst for power to control the universe.
